p: Liver biopsies performed on hepatitis A patients have revealed hepatocellular necrosis with ballooning, eosinophilic degeneration, and infiltration of mononuclear cells, accounting for the liver injury due to direct viral invasion and cellular immune response [ 5]. Serum AST/ALT levels both rise rapidly during the prodromal period, reach peak levels, and then decrease by approximately 75% per week. Serum bilirubin concentrations reach peak levels later and decline less rapidly than serum aminotransferases.
